The Center for Medical Progress recorded: Mary Gatter, Planned Parenthood Federation of America’s Medical Directors’ Council president, discussing fetal tissue donations.
Del: John O’Bannon, R-Henrico, asked his constituents whether Virginia should take action against Planned Parenthood in a survey that mentioned the claim.
Planned Parenthood has acknowledged that: Washington and California - supplies fetal tissue to medical researchers and that the one in California has been getting reimbursed.
Federal law allows organizations perform: reasonable payments associated with the transportation, implantation, processing, preservation, quality control, or storage of human fetal tissue," but bars them from profiting from the sale of fetal tissue.
